XenotypeDef.label: pariah
XenotypeDef.description: Pariahs are individuals cursed with a profound psychic nullity, existing as living anti-psychic entities that suppress the powers of the warp in their vicinity. Their unique abilities make them invaluable in the war against psychic threats. In battle, they are harbingers of silence, cutting through the chaotic energies of the warp and serving as a stark counterbalance to the psychic forces that threaten the Imperium.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: With no presence in the warp these beings are resistant to psychic attacks.

XenotypeDef.label: living saint
XenotypeDef.description: In the name of the Holy God-Emperor, the path to sainthood begins with unwavering faith and total devotion to His divine will. This path often involves martyrdom — dying in battle or self-sacrifice for humanity. Reborn in celestial glory, they return, wreathed in the Emperor’s light, to fight His enemies with supernatural power and righteousness, a beacon to all faithful.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: A Living Saint is an extraordinarily devout servant of the Emperor of Mankind, who displays seemingly miraculous, supernatural abilities derived from potent faith in the God-Emperor during his or her lifetime.

XenotypeDef.label: firstborn marine
XenotypeDef.description: Forged from the Emperor's ancient designs, the Firstborn stand as the original and proud warriors of the Adeptus Astartes, each bound by the geneseed of their Primarch. Untouched by any natural disease, space marines are able to suffer wounds that would kill an ordinary man and still live to fight another day.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Barely human, but instead superhuman; genetically engineered to be superior to normal humans in every way.

XenotypeDef.label: primaris marine
XenotypeDef.description: The Primaris, crafted in secret by Archmagos Belisarius Cawl under the Emperor’s long-forgotten edict, are the next evolution of the Adeptus Astartes, engineered to surpass even the Firstborn in strength, resilience, and combat prowess.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Barely human, but instead superhuman; genetically engineered to be superior to normal humans in every way. These primaris stand above and are stronger than the standard space marine.

XenotypeDef.label: firstborn marine psyker
XenotypeDef.description: Rare Space Marine psykers who tap into the tumultuous energies of the warp, channeling its power to elevate their combat prowess. Trained as both warriors and seers, they unleash psychic might upon their foes, weaving spells of destruction while dancing on the precipice of corruption, ever vigilant against the dark whispers that seek to ensnare their souls.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Barely human, but instead superhuman; genetically engineered to be superior to normal humans in every way. These space marines carry the psyker gene, which gives them unnatural abilities.

XenotypeDef.label: thunder warrior
XenotypeDef.description: The Thunder Warriors were the Emperor’s first creations, towering and brutal warriors forged for the unification of Terra. Unmatched in raw strength and fury, they were designed to crush all opposition, embodying the Emperor's wrath on the battlefield. But their power came at a cost — engineered for short, violent lives, they burned brightly and briefly, knowing only war before being cast aside as the Imperium's dark, forgotten foundation.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Gene-enhanced warriors created by the Emperor to be living weapons, the Thunder Warriors were known to be physically stronger, more savage, more resilient and more potent in combat than the later Firstborn, though they were not as long-lived and suffered from often dangerous mental instability and early metabolic collapse when their bodies began to reject their augmentations.

XenotypeDef.label: custodes
XenotypeDef.description: The Adeptus Custodes, hand-crafted by the Emperor Himself, are His personal guardians, surpassing even the Space Marines in skill, might, and loyalty. Immortal and unmatched in their martial prowess, they stand vigilant at His side, their golden armor gleaming as they protect the Master of Mankind.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Created by the Master of Mankind personally, these beings are what primarch are to a space marine. The Adeptus Custodes are incarnations of incredible strength and vigilance.

XenotypeDef.label: primarch
XenotypeDef.description: The Primarchs, crafted by the Emperor’s own hand, are demigods of war and leadership, each embodying a facet of His divine vision. Towering above all others in might, intellect, and charisma, they were destined to lead the Legiones Astartes and shape the fate of the Imperium. Their very presence reshaping worlds and inspiring legions.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Bred to be perfect generals, warriors and statesmen; larger, stronger, faster, and smarter than any normal human could ever hope to be. They possessed a potent charisma and martial prowess that made them like the mythical gods of old — untouchable by disease, old age or supposedly the petty failings of lesser men.
